channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- CICS TX Standard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- CICS TX Standard

item.title: CVE-2023-43018|2024-08-02T19:37:23.354Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20standard
item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard 11.1 and Advanced 10.1, 11.1 performs an operation at a privilege level that is higher than the minimum level required, which creates new weaknesses or amplifies the consequences of other weaknesses. IBM X-Force ID: 266163.

item.title: CVE-2023-42027|2024-08-02T19:16:49.655Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20standard
item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard 11.1, Advanced 10.1, 11.1, and TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.1, 8.2, 9.1 are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 266057.

item.title: CVE-2023-42029|2024-08-02T19:16:49.682Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20standard
item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard 11.1, Advanced 10.1, 11.1, and TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.1, 8.2, 9.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 266059.
